articles.author: Chandraveer Mathur
articles.title: Apple may never acknowledge the EU's role in bringing USB-C to the iPhone 15 - Android Police
articles.description: Spinning the battle as the ultimate pro-consumer move
articles.content:
Summary
<ul><li> The European Union has successfully forced Apple and other brands to adopt USB-C by the end of 2024, leading to the iPhone 15 series likely adopting sharing a port with Android devi… [+3981 chars]
